comment.author: 83025347@N00
comment._content:
This child labor series is very interesting. This was all going on just 100 years ago.

I lived in Somerville for several years. There is no Warren Street in Somerville now. There is a Warren Ave but it seems like an unlikely location for this kind of activity. South Street seems right.

comment.author: 65589481@N05
comment._content: Beautiful    all  Children.  very  interesting  this  pictures.

comment.author: 47713974@N00
comment._content: There is, in fact, a Warren Street right around the corner from South Street, though it may be located in Cambridge? It's on the city line. See Google Maps here: 39 Warren St, Cambridge. There even seem to be a couple of brick garages on the street that could date from the 1910s.
